summary: Angela begins to hang around with Pablo and his gang of young robbers.
cast: Berta Socuéllamos|Jose Antonio Valdelomar González|Jesús Arias|José María Hervás Roldán|María del Mar Serrano|Consuelo Pascual|André Falcon|Yves Arcanel|Yves Barsacq|Suzy Hannier|Alain Doutey|Joaquín Escola|Matías Prats
title: Deprisa, deprisa
